Name: Seedot Hat
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Seedot, Nuzleaf, and Shiftry.  Finding a Seedot Hat at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
